game.name: Waddle & Rescue
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Waddle & Rescue is a sliding puzzle logic 3D game, where you'll take control of Teo the Penguin, a cute but brave adventurer, in his mission to rescue all the lost penguins around the world. Waddle your way across different biomes, sliding and solving puzzles in order to find his lost pals.
